OOC: who's near of Hydras?


nightlight:

Nightlight followed Rodimus, she was ready to open fire. 






--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:



> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus finally runs out of the Maximal base, ready for action. 
Nightlight at his side.
> 
> Rodimus Prime(To Nightlight): Just dont leave me today, my love.
> 
> Rodimus fires three plasma charges at Hydras.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Galvatron, I know you are in there. Let's finish 
what we started all those years ago!
